title: Software Engineer
details: Develop and manage the components that form the structure of ClockMe App.
Developed subscription plans to enhance revenue and implemented a seamless checkout process with integrated payment gateways for a smooth user experience
Improved code readability, maintainability, and performance. Removed code smells and redundancies for a more efficient application. Applied best practices and design patterns to enhance code quality.

title: Lead Software Engineer
details: Worked on enterprise retail system. A web-based POS application using SaaS architecture.
Built and maintained components to several applications that comprises the entire POS.
Optimized application performance and increased client retention rates.
Performed code reviews and provided consultations to junior developers.

title: Commission
details: Developed dynamic services webpage for interactive interface.
Developed bookstore webpage for displaying collection and available books.

title: Intern
details: Worked along with Research & Development developers with the task to do unit testing on their deliverables.
Created software documentation for unit testing.
